Description: Papyrus bearing 24 lines of a Coptic text written along the fibres (recto) and 1 line against the fibres (verso).
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (83781) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/83781)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: bloom, fractured, lifting, loss, deposit Black ink (smudged) Tabbed: kraft paper Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: cloth Object Priority: B Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: B Curatorial condition comment: fair - lacunae
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: O.CrumVC 46 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
